name: UCCX Stats App

screenshots.caption: Lastest Version with agent state info

summary: Application to provide realtime CSQ stats for UCCX
short_description:
This project was created to provide the option to use a standalone application that provides the same near real time CSQ statistics as seen in other browser based solutions.

Please use the Files link above to find and download the application for either Linux or Windows.

At this point this application is very much a work in progress.  Please read the .txt file in either the Linux or Windows folders for installation instructions.

You may notice the data is pulled from the UCCX server then written to the file system as a .csv file.  I don't like this method but was the only way I could get it to work.  If there is anyone out there who would like to help run the queries in the code instead of shelling out to the OS, please let me know.

There is a discussion forum here, please use it for any comments.  I will respond when I can.

***Update 8/31/2013***
There is a new version available that also includes the  agent state information.  See additional folders in the Files area.
